gameDetails.name: Clank!: Enchanted Dice
gameDetails.description:
Enchanted Dice Promo given out during The Dice Tower 2017 Indiegogo Campaign.

"Reveal two cubes from the Dragon Bag. For each Dragon cube or cube of your color, (1). Return all the cubes."

This card has a skill cost of 3 and will provide 1 gold for each Dragon cube or cube of your own color.  The card is also worth 1 point for its owner at the end of the game.
